sense.gloss: to become blunt, to grow dull
to become less capable, to weaken, to falter

sdata.j: ↑飲↑↓の↓めば↑飲↑↓の↓むほど↑注意↑↓ちゅうい↓↑力↑↓りょく↓が|↑鈍↑↓なま↓る|。
sdata.e: The more you drink, the less careful you will be.

sdata.j: 「↑最近↑↓さいきん↓、↑書道↑↓しょどう↓してないんだ」「そうなんだ。たまにはしないと↑勘↑↓かん↓が|↑鈍↑↓にぶ↓る|よ」
sdata.e: I haven't done any calligraphy lately. "Is that so? If you don't practice every so often you'll start to lose your touch."

sdata.j: 「↑最近↑↓さいきん↓、↑書道↑↓しょどう↓してないんだ」「そうなんだ。たまにはしないと↑腕↑↓うで↓が|↑鈍↑↓なま↓る|よ」
sdata.e: I haven't done any calligraphy recently. "Oh, really? Well, if you keep putting it off, you'll lose your touch."
